title: Rs 30.8m tome on Ferrari with 1,500 diamonds: Lankan buys world’s most expensive book
content: A Sri Lankan has become the first in the world to buy the world’s most expensive book currently in print – an astounding Rs.30.8 million  worth (US$ 275,000) tome on carmaker Ferrari encrusted with 1,500 diamonds. In comparison, a Ferrari 458 Italia car costs only around US$ 225,000….
